name: Environmental Partnership Association
goal:
The mission of EPA is to empower people by supporting community-based sustainable development initiatives within Central European countries and to actively participate in policy making for the benefit of civil society on European and global level.
The goal of the Association is to advocate for, support and organize international cooperation of the member organizations, which aim at strengthening the contribution of civil society, in particular environmental NGOs, to sustainable development in Europe and globally.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives: Main EU wide initiatives followed by our organization are 7. Environmental Action Programme, Biodiversity strategy, Climate and Energy Framework, Renewable energy directive, so mainly the ENVI and CLIMA agenda and some pieces related to renewables. Part of our attention we also focus on Civil Rights and Justice issues. We focus on DG ENV, DG CLIMA and also EP ENVI committee.
